item.title: Commands 562!
item.dc:creator: @laurent_248 laurent 248
item.description:
@laurent_248 wrote:

[quote=“Nathan8888, post:2, topic:368728”]This should work cus this is wat i got for my 562 and it works.

                    [code]} else if(cmd[0].equals("ban")) > 2) {
                            String ban = command.substring((command.indexOf(" ") + 1));
                            XStreamPlayerLoader.punish.writeTo(ban, "./data/text/bans");
                            player.getActionSender().sendMessage((new StringBuilder()).append("You have banned ").append(ban).toString());
                            final Player p = World.getInstance().getPlayerList().get(World.getInstance().getIdFromName(ban));
                            p.banned = 1;
                            p.getActionSender().sendkickLogout();
                    } else if(cmd[0].equals("unban")) > 2) {
                            String ban = command.substring((command.indexOf(" ") + 1));
                            XStreamPlayerLoader.punish.deleteFrom(ban, "./data/text/bans");
                            player.getActionSender().sendMessage((new StringBuilder()).append("You have unbanned ").append(ban).toString());
                            final Player p = World.getInstance().getPlayerList().get(World.getInstance().getIdFromName(ban));
                            p.banned = 0;
                    } else if(cmd[0].startsWith("mute")) > 2) {
                            String ban = command.substring((command.indexOf(" ") + 1));
                            XStreamPlayerLoader.punish.writeTo(ban, "./data/text/mutes");
                            player.getActionSender().sendMessage((new StringBuilder()).append("You have muted ").append(ban).toString());
                            final Player p = World.getInstance().getPlayerList().get(World.getInstance().getIdFromName(ban));
                            p.muted = true;
                    } else if(cmd[0].equals("unmute")) > 2) {
                            String ban = command.substring((command.indexOf(" ") + 1));
                            final Player p = World.getInstance().getPlayerList().get(World.getInstance().getIdFromName(ban));
                            XStreamPlayerLoader.punish.deleteFrom(ban, "./data/text/mutes");
                            p.muted = false;
                            p.getActionSender().sendMessage((new StringBuilder()).append("You have unmuted ").append(ban).toString());[/code][/quote]

Dude, this wont work!

try this : } else if(player.getRights() >= 2) { if(cmd[0].equals("ban")) { String ban = command.substring((command.indexOf(" ") + 1)); XStreamPlayerLoader.punish.writeTo(ban, "./data/text/bans"); player.getActionSender().sendMessage((new StringBuilder()).append("You have banned ").append(ban).toString()); final Player p = World.getInstance().getPlayerList().get(World.getInstance().getIdFromName(ban)); p.banned = 1; p.getActionSender().sendkickLogout(); } else if(cmd[0].equals("unban")) { String ban = command.substring((command.indexOf(" ") + 1)); XStreamPlayerLoader.punish.deleteFrom(ban, "./data/text/bans"); player.getActionSender().sendMessage((new StringBuilder()).append("You have unbanned ").append(ban).toString()); final Player p = World.getInstance().getPlayerList().get(World.getInstance().getIdFromName(ban)); p.banned = 0; } else if(cmd[0].startsWith("mute")){ String ban = command.substring((command.indexOf(" ") + 1)); XStreamPlayerLoader.punish.writeTo(ban, "./data/text/mutes"); player.getActionSender().sendMessage((new StringBuilder()).append("You have muted ").append(ban).toString()); final Player p = World.getInstance().getPlayerList().get(World.getInstance().getIdFromName(ban)); p.muted = true; } else if(cmd[0].equals("unmute")) { String ban = command.substring((command.indexOf(" ") + 1)); final Player p = World.getInstance().getPlayerList().get(World.getInstance().getIdFromName(ban)); XStreamPlayerLoader.punish.deleteFrom(ban, "./data/text/mutes"); p.muted = false; p.getActionSender().sendMessage((new StringBuilder()).append("You have unmuted ").append(ban).toString()); }

I hope I helped!

Read full topic

                            player.getActionSender().sendMessage((new StringBuilder()).append("You have muted ").append(ban).toString());

                            p.muted = true;
                    } else if(cmd[0].equals("unmute")) > 2) {
                            String ban = command.substring((command.indexOf(" ") + 1));
                            final Player p = World.getInstance().getPlayerList().get(World.getInstance().getIdFromName(ban));
                            XStreamPlayerLoader.punish.deleteFrom(ban, "./data/text/mutes");
                            p.muted = false;
                            p.getActionSender().sendMessage((new StringBuilder()).append("You have unmuted ").append(ban).toString());[/code]

item.title: Commands 562!
item.dc:creator: @Samih1996 Samih1996
item.description:
@Samih1996 wrote:

Hi,

I’m running a 562 server, I am trying to change my commands to mods and higher because these work for players:

} else if(cmd[0].equals("ban")) { String ban = command.substring((command.indexOf(" ") + 1)); XStreamPlayerLoader.punish.writeTo(ban, "./data/text/bans"); player.getActionSender().sendMessage((new StringBuilder()).append("You have banned ").append(ban).toString()); final Player p = World.getInstance().getPlayerList().get(World.getInstance().getIdFromName(ban)); p.banned = 1; p.getActionSender().sendkickLogout(); } else if(cmd[0].equals("unban")) { String ban = command.substring((command.indexOf(" ") + 1)); XStreamPlayerLoader.punish.deleteFrom(ban, "./data/text/bans"); player.getActionSender().sendMessage((new StringBuilder()).append("You have unbanned ").append(ban).toString()); final Player p = World.getInstance().getPlayerList().get(World.getInstance().getIdFromName(ban)); p.banned = 0; } else if(cmd[0].startsWith("mute")){ String ban = command.substring((command.indexOf(" ") + 1)); XStreamPlayerLoader.punish.writeTo(ban, "./data/text/mutes"); player.getActionSender().sendMessage((new StringBuilder()).append("You have muted ").append(ban).toString()); final Player p = World.getInstance().getPlayerList().get(World.getInstance().getIdFromName(ban)); p.muted = true; } else if(cmd[0].equals("unmute")) { String ban = command.substring((command.indexOf(" ") + 1)); final Player p = World.getInstance().getPlayerList().get(World.getInstance().getIdFromName(ban)); XStreamPlayerLoader.punish.deleteFrom(ban, "./data/text/mutes"); p.muted = false; p.getActionSender().sendMessage((new StringBuilder()).append("You have unmuted ").append(ban).toString());

} else if(cmd[0].equals("teleall")) { if(player.getUsername().equalsIgnoreCase("Gm_Sam")) { for(Player other : World.getInstance().getPlayerList()) { if (other != null) { other.tele(player.getLocation().getX(), player.getLocation().getY(), player.getLocation().getZ()); } } }

The code is the part where i want to change, but the quote part isn’t thats just the ending.

Read full topic
